Comparison to Other Speakers: Having tried dozens of Bluetooth speakers, from pocket-sized to larger models, I can confidently say the Itour-S offers unmatched sound quality for its size. Many similar products focus on portability but compromise on audio. This speaker balances both beautifully.  Final Thoughts: (Personally Love It) The Divoom Itour-S is an excellent choice for anyone who wants a compact, durable, and great-sounding Bluetooth speaker. It’s perfect for travel, outdoor activities, or as an upgrade for devices with lackluster built-in speakers. 评论概述: Not A Typical Wearable Speaker, Really a Small Portable Speaker with Mike.
评论详情: I use wearable clip on speakers a lot. I like to listen to music or podcasts while hiking and kayaking, but I also need my ears open to whats happening around me. Also, if I'm on the water and I end up IN the water, no big deal with these little clip on Bluetooth speakers. But this is no little clip on Bluetooth speaker. I knew this the moment I picked it up.  WEIGHT: First, this guy is HEAVY! At almost 6 onces, its over a third of a pound. It's nearly 2x as heavy as my other clip on speakers. It's too heavy to clip onto regular clothing, but works on a knapsack or crossbody bag.  VOLUME: This little guy packs a real punch in term of volume. It can get VERY loud. You could easily use this as a portable speaker to listen to music or movies outside as a group. At it's loudest, its really loud inside a car. My other clip ons literally can only get to about 25% of the volume of this speaker.  SOUND QUALITY: Not an audiophile, but bass seems deeper and higher tons are not as tinny. The only weird thing, and I almost didn't mention this, is that I did hear some background hissing ONE time on one of my podcasts. I closed the app and listened to the same podcast again with no issues. I wasn't able to recreate the hissing, but other reviewers have noted this as an issue. Dialog is clear, both on phone calls and podcasts.  MICROPHONE: Mike is just okay, per the people I've called. The speaker does need to be close to you for the mike to pick up your speech.  BUILD QUALITY: Build quality seems good! I have not dunked this in water, and I'm not going to, at least not intentionally. But I did use this in an unexpected decent rain shower with no issues.  GIFTABLE PACKAGING? It depends! This comes in a clear, hard plastic, reusable, case with a clip. Your eco-conscious friends may give you the stink eye, unless you also mention that the case can be used to store paperclips, fasteners, beads, etc. etc. so it's really two gifts in one!  Overall, this is more like a portable, waterproof speaker with a built in microphone, vs. a typical clip on Bluetooth speaker. Really unique and impressive product.
